patthana21.1:5.1: Nahetuṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.1:5.2: Nahetuṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nahetu kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.1:5.3: Nahetuṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu kusalo ca nahetu kusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana21.1:6.1: Nahetuṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.1:7.1: Nahetuṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.1:7.2: Nanahetuṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.1:7.3: Nahetuṃ naabyākatañca nanahetuṃ naabyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.1:8.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
